article.title: Genome Assembly and Annotation 2021
article.tease: A 3-day training course on bioinformatics methods for de novo assembly and structural and functional annotation of genomes using short (Illumina) and long reads (PacBio / Oxford Nanopore) sequencing technologies (will be run in french).
article.contact: Anthony Bretaudeau, Alexandre Cormier, Erwan Corre, St√©phanie Robin
